name: The Legend of Chibi Ninja (FREE DEMO)

description:
EXPLODING DEADLY COMBOS!

This small ninja sure packs a punch to kill his enemies! However, this won't be an easy task, behind the onset beggining full of pretty cute colors and easy platforming  lies a very challenging, extremely fast paced platformer full of dashes and secrets with giant mechanical merciless bosses that won't have pity on you. 

It also doesn't help that CHIBI NINJA is very fragile and dies in one single hit.

Are you up to the task?

FEATURES

-Frustrating fast paced gameplay. (Ideal for SPEEDRUNNERS!)

-Unique NEVER SEEN BEFORE EXPLODING BOMB SHURIKENS!

-9 SUPER COOL BADASS MECHANICAL BOSSES.

-SUPER HECTIC FRIENDSHIP DESTROYING MULTIPLAYER MODE!

-Tons of secrets and shortcuts that will test your gaming skills!
